Welcome to MMG 464 RNA-seq tutorial¶

Contents:¶

RNA-seq module outline¶
Day Module
Wed 02/25 Install software and make sure everyone is on the same page
Fri 02/27 RNA-seq background information, basic Unix commands, and Bowtie primer
Mon 03/02 Align sequences with Bowtie and FastQC primer for alignment quality assessment
Wed 03/04 Assess the quality of the Bowtie alignment with FastQC and start counting gene features with HTSeq
Fri 03/06 Differential gene expression analysis with edgeR
